scripts.build-fe: cd fe && npm i && npm run build
scripts.postbuild-fe: rm -rf be/client && mkdir be/client && cp -a fe/dist/manazel-alabrar-fe/browser/. be/client
scripts.build-be: cd be && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-fe && npm run build-be
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp be/dist/* public && cp -r be/client public
